scripts.build-tests-rust: dotnet run -c Release -- ../../../../tests/Rust/Fable.Tests.Rust.fsproj --outDir out-tests-rust --fableLib out-lib --lang Rust
scripts.build-tests-dart: dotnet run -c Release -- ../../../../tests/Dart/src/Fable.Tests.Dart.fsproj --outDir out-tests-dart --fableLib out-lib --lang Dart
scripts.build-tests-python: dotnet run -c Release -- ../../../../tests/Python/Fable.Tests.Python.fsproj --outDir out-tests-python --fableLib out-lib --lang Python
scripts.prebuild-cli: npm run clean && npm run prebuild-lib && npm run build-lib-cli
scripts.build-cli: dotnet run -c Release --project ../../../Fable.Cli -- bench-compiler.fsproj --outDir out-node --fableLib out-lib
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run build-lib
scripts.prebuild-ts: npm run clean && npm run build-lib-ts
scripts.build: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-node --fableLib out-lib
scripts.build-ts: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-ts --fableLib out-lib-ts --lang TypeScript
scripts.build-rust: dotnet run -c Release bench-compiler.fsproj out-rust --fableLib out-lib --lang Rust
scripts.postbuild-ts: cp tsconfig.json out-ts && npm run tsc -- -p out-ts --outDir out-js
scripts.prebuild-native: npm run prebuild-lib && npm run build-lib-native
scripts.build-native: npm run native -- bench-compiler.fsproj --outDir out-node --fableLib out-lib
scripts.rollup-bundle: npm run rollup -- out-node/app.js -o dist/bundle.js --format esm
scripts.prebuild-lib-ts: mkdir -p out-lib-ts && cp -r ../../../fable-library/*.ts out-lib-ts && cp -r ../../../fable-library/lib out-lib-ts
scripts.prebuild-test: npm run clean && npm run build-lib
scripts.prebuild-test-ts: npm run clean && npm run build-lib-ts
scripts.postbuild-test-ts: cp tsconfig.json out-test-ts && npm run tsc -- -p out-test-ts --outDir out-test-js
scripts.prebuild-tests: npm run clean && npm run build-lib
scripts.prebuild-tests-ts: npm run clean && npm run build-lib-ts
scripts.perf: perf record -q -e cpu-clock -F 99 -g -- node --perf-basic-prof --interpreted-frames-native-stack dist/bundle.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 --benchmark
scripts.perf-es: perf record -q -e cpu-clock -F 99 -g -- node --perf-basic-prof --interpreted-frames-native-stack ./out-node/app.js bench-compiler.fsproj out-node2 --benchmark
scripts.trace-rust: dotnet trace collect --duration 00:00:01:00 --format speedscope -- dotnet bin/Release/net7.0/bench-compiler.dll ../../../../tests/Rust/Fable.Tests.Rust.fsproj --outDir out-tests-rust --fableLib out-lib --lang Rust
